comment-list.a11y-add: Option to ask a question or to write a message to the audience
comment-list.a11y-check_circle: Filters all questions marked as correct
comment-list.a11y-not_interested: Filters all questions marked as wrong
comment-list.a11y-select-time: Option to set the period for the comments to be displayed
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1h: Show all comments of the last hour
comment-list.a11y-select-time-3h: Show all comments of the last 3 hours
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1d: Show all comments of the last day
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1w: Show all comments of the last 7 days
comment-list.a11y-select-time-2w: Show all comments of the last 14 days
comment-list.add-comment: Ask a question or write a message to the audience.
comment-list.pause-comments: Freezes the display to read or present the questions at rest. Questions can still be asked and scored. The display is only updated again by clicking the button.
comment-list.comment-stream-stopped: The question stream has been stopped.
comment-list.comment-stream-started: The question stream has been started.
comment-list.comment-sent-to-moderator: The question will now be reviewed by a moderator.
comment-list.really-delete: Do you really want to delete this question?
comment-list.question: Question

spacy-dialog.force-language-selection: The language of the text input could not be detected automatically.
spacy-dialog.add-manually: Enter a keyword for your question. Separate several keywords with a comma.
spacy-dialog.select-keywords: The text analysis suggests the following keywords. Which best characterise your question?

comment-page.a11y-comment_grade: Marks this question as a bonus question
comment-page.a11y-comment_not_grade: Resets the marking as a bonus question
comment-page.a11y-text_correct: This question was marked as correct.
comment-page.a11y-text_grade: This question was marked as a bonus question.
comment-page.a11y-text_read: This question was discussed in full view on the beamer
comment-page.a11y-text_wrong: The question was answered in the negative.
comment-page.acknowledge: Moves the question back to the public list
comment-page.really-delete-answer: Do you really want to delete this answer?
comment-page.has-answer: You have answered the question. Click here to view or change your answer.
comment-page.ask-question-description: Enter your question or message to the audience …
comment-page.comment: Question {{ comment }} was asked at {{ time }} and has currently {{ votes }}. {{correct}} {{wrong}} {{bonus}} {{beamer}}
comment-page.enter-comment: Your entry will be fixed at the top of the list.
comment-page.error-comment-text: Your text is too long. Please shorten it.
comment-page.error-comment-data: Too much formatting or linked elements. Please remove some.
comment-page.live-announcer: You are now on the questions page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.live-announcer-moderation: You are now on the moderation page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.new-comment: A new question with the content, {{ comment }}, has been asked.
comment-page.no-comments-with-filter: No questions with selected filter settings
comment-page.tag-to-filter: Click on the question category to filter questions in that category.
comment-page.user-number: Click on the number to filter the questions from this anonymous questioner.
comment-page.keywords-per-question: Click to display the keywords that have been entered for the question.

content.at-least-one: In multiple choice mode you have to select at least 1 true answer.
content.need-answers: Choice content needs answers. Please add some answers.
content.no-empty: No empty fields allowed. Please check subject and body.
content.only-one: In single choice mode is only 1 true answer allowed.
content.only-one-true: In single mode is only 1 true answer allowed.
content.same-answer: Same answer label is not allowed.
content.select-one: In single choice mode you have to select 1 true answer.
content.subject: Subject
content.submitted: Content submitted. Ready for creation of new content.

room-page.a11y-add-moderator: Add the entered User as Moderator
room-page.a11y-cloud_download: Copy link to session to the clipboard
room-page.a11y-edit: Opens a window with options, rename room, add description and delete room
room-page.a11y-gavel: Opens all questions selected by the moderator
room-page.a11y-insert_comment: Opens a window to manage questions
room-page.a11y-moderator-email: Enter the email of the user you want to add as a moderator
room-page.a11y-person: Opens a window to add moderators
room-page.a11y-question_answer: Opens all questions asked about the session
room-page.a11y-room-name: Give the session a new name here.
room-page.a11y-settings: Opens a window with options to manage sessions, manage questions, and add moderators.
room-page.a11y-settings-direct-send: Slider to send Questions directly to participant
room-page.a11y-threshold: Slider for setting the threshold for visible questions
room-page.no-bonus: No bonus stars have been given yet.
room-page.copy-session-id: Copy the link to this session to the clipboard and pass it on to the session participants.
room-page.live-announcer: You're in the session now. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
room-page.moderator-not-found: A user with the entered mail address could not be found. Are you sure that the user has registered at »frag.jetzt« with this address?
room-page.name-length-error: Titel must be between 3 and 20 characters.
room-page.really-delete-comments: Do you really want to delete all questions in this room? This action cannot be undone.
room-page.really-delete-comments-hint: There are questions in this room that you marked for a bonus. Remove the stars to delete all questions.
room-page.really-remove-moderator: Do you really want to remove the following moderator?
room-page.really2: ? This action cannot be undone. If you have given bonus stars, export all questions so that you can check submitted bonus tokens.
room-page.reallyContent: Do you really want to delete content
room-page.reallySession: Do you really want to delete session
room-page.session-id-copied: Session link was copied to the clipboard.
room-page.settings-comment-moderation-description: You or one of your moderators can ban questions from the display.
room-page.settings-direct-send-description: Every question is published immediately. Disable this option if you want to publish each question individually.
room-page.tag-error: Must be between 3 and 30 characters long
room-page.threshold-description: Set the threshold value above which a negatively rated question should be displayed.
room-page.question: Question
room-page.really-delete-token: Do you really want to delete this token?
room-page.really-delete-tokens: Do you really want to delete all tokens of this session?
room-page.tokens-deleted: All tokens of this sessions have been deleted.
room-page.words-will-be-overwritten: Profane words will be overwritten with '***'
room-page.only-specific-language-will-be-filtered: Only the language of the question will be filtered
room-page.partial-words-will-be-filtered: Profane partial words will be also filtered

session.a11y-description: Enter a description of the session

tag-cloud.overview-question-topic-tooltip: Number of questions with this topic
tag-cloud.overview-questioners-topic-tooltip: Number of questioners with this topic

topic-cloud-dialog.spacy-labels: Which nouns of the text analysis should be displayed as topics?
topic-cloud-dialog.words-will-be-overwritten: profane words will be overwritten with '***'
topic-cloud-dialog.only-specific-language-will-be-filtered: Only the language of the question will be filtered
topic-cloud-dialog.partial-words-will-be-filtered: Profane partial words will be also filtered

topic-cloud-confirm-dialog.delete-message: Do you really want to delete the topic
topic-cloud-confirm-dialog.merge-message: Keyword already exists, do you want to merge both keywords

tag-cloud-config.random-angle-note: If Enabled, the rotation of the individual weight-class is disabled
tag-cloud-config.font-size-max-tooltip: Size ratio max. / min. font size
tag-cloud-config.highestWeight: Number of tags with highest weight
tag-cloud-config.highestWeight-tooltip: show x tags with the highest weight
tag-cloud-config.rotate-weight: Rotate all entries of this class by x degrees
tag-cloud-config.rotate-weight-tooltip: Rotate all entries of this class by x degrees
tag-cloud-config.manual-weight-number-tooltip: Quantity Limitation of this weight class
tag-cloud-config.manual-weight-number-note: Limits the respective weight class to a self-defined value
